Package com.fdmgroup.ElevatorProject

Class Elevator

java.lang.Object
com.fdmgroup.ElevatorProject.Elevator
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Runnable
public class Elevator extends Object implements Runnable, Serializable
Represents the main object controlling the behavior of an elevator in the system. This object manages the state, movement, and handling of people inside and outside the elevator. It simulates movement, loading, and unloading of people, depending on the current floors and requests made to the elevator system.
See Also:

      public ConcurrentSkipListSet<Integer> getFloorsToGo()

    • operateElevator

      public void operateElevator() throws InterruptedException
      Simulates elevator behaviour by moving between floors based on the floorsToGo set.
      Throws:
      InterruptedException - if the thread is interrupted while waiting.

    • addPersonToLoad

      public void addPersonToLoad(Person person)
      Processes elevator requests by adding a Person object to the elevator's waiting list. Additionally, updates the floors to visit in the `floorsToGo` set accordingly.
      Parameters:
      person - the Person object requesting to use the elevator

    • shouldChangeDirection

      private boolean shouldChangeDirection()
      Determines whether the elevator should change its direction based on the current floor and direction.
      Returns:
      true if the elevator should change direction; otherwise false.

    • goToFloor

      public void goToFloor(int floor) throws InterruptedException
      Moves the elevator to the specified floor.
      Parameters:
      floor - The destination floor the elevator will move to.
      Throws:
      InterruptedException - If interrupted during the movement process.

    • movesFloor

      private void movesFloor(int numFloors) throws InterruptedException
      Moves the elevator by the specified number of floors, and Elevator states `isIdle` and `goingUp`
      Parameters:
      numFloors - the number of floors the elevator will move
      Throws:
      InterruptedException - if the thread is interrupted while moving

    • updateFloorRequests

      public void updateFloorRequests()
      Updates `floorsToGo` (list of floors to visit), based on the people associated with the elevator. `floorsToGo` contains the src floors of people waiting outside and the dest floors of people inside.

    • loadPeople

      public void loadPeople() throws InterruptedException
      Loads eligible Person objects into the Elevator from outside if they are at the Elevator's current floor. Checks the number of Person objects inside if less than the capacity before loading. Otherwise, it will just remove the person object from the outside list.
      Throws:
      InterruptedException - if the thread is interrupted while pausing during the door open/close.

    • unloadPeople

      public void unloadPeople() throws InterruptedException
      Unloads Person objects from the Elevator at the current floor where destination matches current floor.
      Throws:
      InterruptedException - if the thread is interrupted while pausing during the door open/close.

    • pauseOnDoorOpenClose

      public void pauseOnDoorOpenClose() throws InterruptedException
      Pauses the execution for door opening and closing simulation.
      Throws:
      InterruptedException - if the thread is interrupted while pausing

    • pauseOnFloorMove

      public void pauseOnFloorMove() throws InterruptedException
      Pauses the execution for simulating the movement of the elevator between floors.
      Throws:
      InterruptedException - if the thread is interrupted while pausing

    • run

      public void run()
      Specified by:
      run in interface Runnable

    • kill

      public void kill()

    • isRunning

      public boolean isRunning()
